Chapter Previous Next

class ghostGLPinchXForm : public ghostGLActionObject

Allow the PHANToM position/orientation to change the camera view. The effect is as if clicking the stylus button grabbed/pinched to scene and allowed you to manipulate these scene with the PHANToM. But note that the camera is actually moving, the scene is not.

From header file: ghostGLPinchXForm.h

Constructors and Destructors
ghostGLPinchXFormConstructor.
~ghostGLPinchXForm
Functions
start Enable pinch mode.
stop End pinch mode.
updatePinchXform Call each graphics update while pinch is enabled.
Virtual Functions
preDisplayChecks if we should start or stop.
removeStop us before we get removed.
